statements: UPDATE UserBehaviorPatterns SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, is_fraud = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123 AND transaction_id = 456
UPDATE UserBehaviorPatterns SET is_fraud = FALSE, transaction_date = '2022-04-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 789 AND transaction_amount = 500.75
UPDATE UserBehaviorPatterns SET transaction_amount = 500.00, is_fraud = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123 AND transaction_id = 456;
UPDATE UserBehaviorPatterns SET is_fraud = FALSE, transaction_amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 100;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123456;
UPDATE fraud_detection SET suspicious_behavior = 'abnormal_activity' WHERE detection_id = 987654;
UPDATE user_behavior SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, transaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE fraud_detection SET detection_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, suspicious_behavior = 'Unusual Login Activity' WHERE detection_id = 67890;
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET event_type = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE transaction_details SET status = 'completed', currency = 'USD' WHERE transaction_id = 456
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET event_type = 'purchase' WHERE transaction_id = 12345 AND user_id = 67890;
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = 150.75, currency = 'USD' WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 100.00 WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_type = 'refund' WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 200.50, first_name = 'John' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 500.75, transaction_type = 'purchase' WHERE user_id = 456 AND timestamp = '2022-07-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET detection_score = 0.7 WHERE user_id = '701c8654-3c4d-4c0d-bbe3-56429e3295f0';
UPDATE transaction_details SET status = 'Approved', amount = 1500.65 WHERE transaction_id = '8a9d010c-8b2c-4358-9adb-98162f9479ab';
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET behavior_type = 'Suspicious' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE account_activity_log SET action = 'Blocked' WHERE log_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4h7i-8j9k-0l1m2n3o4p5';
